document.docAuthor: Sun, Yanchun, Meng, Rui & Wang, Yinglun
document.docTitle: Neogergithoides tubercularis Sun, Meng & Wang, 2012, sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: Neogergithoides, a new genus with a new species from China (Hemiptera: Issidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Neogergithoides, a new genus with a new species from China (Hemiptera: Issidae)

subSubSection.paragraph: Description. Length, male (including tegmen): 7.6 –8.0 mm, length of tegmen: 5.7–6.2 mm ; female (including tegmen): 8.5–9.1 mm , length of tegmen: 6.3 –7.0 mm.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 1–8
Neogergithoides tubercularis
sp. nov.
Male 1. holotype, dorsal view; 2. same, lateral view; 3. head and thorax, dorsal view; 4. fore-, meso-, hind legs; 5.frons and clypeus, ventral view; 6. frons and clypeus, lateral view; 7. tegmen; 8. wing. Scale bars= 1 mm.

FIGURES 9–20
Neogergithoides tubercularis
sp. nov
. 9. capitulum, dorsal view; 10. gonaspiculum bridge, dorsal view; 11. gonoplacs, dorsal view; 12. male genitalia, left side; 13. male anal segment, dorsal view; 14. aedeagus, left side; 15. apex of aedeagus, ventral view; 16. female anal segment, dorsal view; 17. gonoplac, right side; 18. gonapophyses IX, right side; 19. gonapophyses IX, dorsal view; 20. gonapophysis VIII, right side. Scale bars = 0.5 mm.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 21–23
Neogergithoides tubercularis
sp. nov
. 21. female internal reproductive organs, right side; 22. female genitalia, ventral view; 23. female internal reproductive organs, dorsal view.

subSubSection.paragraph: BC 1 , BC 2 : two pouches of bursa copulatrix; dr: ductus receptaculi; dvd: diverticulum ductus; ga: glandula apicalis; Gbd: gonospiculum bridge; Gy VIII: gonapophysis VIII; Gy IX: gonapophyses IX; OC: oviductus communis; or: orificium receptaculi; Sp: spermatheca; spp: spermathecal pump; St VII: sternite VII; Va: anterior vagina; Vp: posterior vagina.
